response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product for $1,250,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between the product's value and market conditions, ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. I look forward to discussing the details and exploring how we can make this opportunity mutually beneficial. Should you require any further information or have questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 1250000}
